This has been one of most popular games in the world. It is probably the most played First  Person Shooter there is. This game is great,  it has awesome graphics that look nice and smooth. The sounds in game are great and you really have to listen to know were the enemy is. This game has alot of options for what style of gameplay you want to play. You can play against bots to get warmed up for multiplayer.  The  game can be really brutal to those who have never played this game before. The overall game is great  and anyone that is into First Person Shooters should get this game. It is highly addictive and hours can go by playing it. The hit marks in game make a head shot more enjoyable to do. Alot of LAN tournaments are based around this game so if you want to make some money then get good at this game and you can't go wrong. Ive really enjoyed playing it and I  know you will too.
Very well balanced multiplayer that offers great gameplay. Great way to break into the PC gaming community if you haven't played anyting by VALVe.

Ich würde Source jedem empfehlen, denn es ist sehr schön mit an zu sehen, selbst nach all den Jahren. Es hat zwar zu in CS:1.6 nicht sehr viele Unterschiede aber man erkennt sie doch sofort alleine was die Grafik angeht. Das im allgemeinen Gameplay ist auch einfacher, dass Crosshair ist schöner und einfacher zu verstellen und anzupassen, das Spray/Rückstoß der Waffen wurde besser angepasst als in 1.6 und Gs:GO aus meiner Sicht. Wer sich davon überzeugen will, der sollte Counter-Strike: Source ausprobieren!

Another great version of the classic FPS game, Counter-Strike. This game however has improved graphics and more community support. The gameplay is highly addicting, but it can be slow at times so you have to be patient to really enjoy this game. The graphics are not too shabby as they have Source's engine, and I personally really like the graphics. From being able to shoot a tire on the ground to make it move, to seeing where an enemy or friend has been shot through the bullet holes and blood squelches around their body. However, the community really makes the game as people are creating new maps all the time, and the people that play in the community are usually a great bunch to play with, often being respectful and nice people. I highly recommend this game for any shooter fan

/Humptastic.
